title: No More Movement...
text:
Bike Shares are an amazing addition to any city. Not only is it a healthy and cheap alternative to other modes of transportation, but it also provides us with data perfect for measuring the pulse of a city. If we consider tourists exploring the city, then an increase in bike activity may signify good weather and a holiday. If we consider local citizens then we can observe spikes throughout the day to understand when people are going to or coming from work.

Normally, we would see a lot of movement in DC, but due to the pandemic people are staying at home - meaning less people are going to work and less tourists are coming to the city.  This sudden change of behavior is immediately apparent when we look at the data...
